bibl.title: Letter, Marimus Willet in Philadelphia, Pa to Ebenezer Hazard., 1796 Oct. 23
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: As I had not the pleasure of receiving the report of the Committee yesterday and expect to set out for Lancaster early tomorrow in the Stage from whence, I shall not return until the end of the week. I have forwarded the printed proposals you furnished me with to Mriss Gilbert Smith &Co: No 136 Water Street and mentioned to them that I would request you to forward the reports of the Committee respecting the terms on which they could have the Insurance done, Ill esteem it a favour in you to forward those terms to them, And on my return from Lancaster Ill do myself the pleasure to call on you.
